mapper.insert: insert into sf_order_payment (id, create_time, sf_order_id, amount, pay_type_id, pay_type_name, is_enabled, out_order_id, pay_serial_num, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sfOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEnabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{outOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paySerialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sf_order_payment set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sf_order_id = #{sfOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_type_id = #{payTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_type_name = #{payTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_enabled = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, out_order_id = #{outOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_serial_num = #{paySerialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, sf_order_id, amount, pay_type_id, pay_type_name, is_enabled, out_order_id, pay_serial_num, remark from sf_order_payment where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, create_time, sf_order_id, amount, pay_type_id, pay_type_name, is_enabled, out_order_id, pay_serial_num, remark from sf_order_payment
select id, create_time, sf_order_id, amount, pay_type_id, pay_type_name, is_enabled, out_order_id, pay_serial_num, remark from sf_order_payment where pay_serial_num = #{paySerialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
